org.sliderule.stats

Class OfflineStatistics

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sliderule.stats.AStatistics
      • org.sliderule.stats.OfflineStatistics
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IStatistics

    public class OfflineStatistics
extends AStatistics

    Offline Calculation of Mean and Variance

    This class provides methods for calculating the mean, variance, and standard deviation of a random variable, after sampling has taken place.

    See Also:
    • Wikipedia: Variance
    • Wikipedia: Arithmetic mean
    • DeGroot, Morris H., and Schervish, Mark J. Probability and Statistics, 3rd Edition. Toronto: Addison-Wesley, 2002. pp. 429. Print.

      • orderedData

        public double[] orderedData()
        Description copied from interface: IStatistics
        Return the backing data set that this IStatistics represents. The data is returned sorted from lowest to highest in natural numeric order.
